website_summaries.verdict: It's a popular product and worth trying even if you prefer traditional cleaners. Tones and cleanses without drying skin or leaving a residue.
pros: Micellar water cleanser with nourishing ingredients
Gentle enough to be used on sensitive skin yet highly effective at cleansing and removing makeup
cons: Bottles with broken or leaking lids upon arrival have been reported
Priced on the higher end of the scale for this type of product

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!! Buy it from Beautylish
customer_reviews.text: I went through a whole bottle of this stuff before realizing it was fake. I ordered one from Beautylish because I was already skeptical, and looked up 'fake bioderma' on google and compared it to my new one from Beautylish, and yup my doubts were answered it was fake. Don't waste money on this. Spend a few more bucks for shipping at Beautylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is this authentic?
customer_reviews.text: Just not 100% sure this is authentic. I never purchased this before, but was not impressed. No smell, and seems water based, as in, water. There was a slight soapy foam, however suspicious, I would recommend to purchase from a reliable dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out around my nose. Not a fan of this product will stick with simple brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not for me...did not take off eye make-up and left skin feeling tight
customer_reviews.author: ll

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like this product one bit!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try Bioderma since I heard so much hype over this product but I was super disappointed! The product smelled and it didn't take my makeup off as well as drugstore brands like Simple or Garnier.
customer_reviews.author: Nunu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cap is broken when I received this. And it is so slow to melt make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Pu Xu

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: So for any of you wondering I contacted amazon myself to ensure this is not sold by a 3rd party, they source and ship the product themselves and it is authentic. The product inside also smells the exact same. This also does the exact same things its done with my past bottles I've bought directly from the retailer in the Past. This stuff is amazing and gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Decowski

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love this product BUT received DIRTY and scratched out bottle.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bad reviews for bioderma
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bad reviews for bioderma... but bioderma sensibo h2o in pink is my HG product. I'm on my 4th bottle. I have sensitive skin and everything makes me break out except this. Why am I giving it 1 star then? Honestly I think this is a fake product. I've bought my previous 2 bottles in a store, ordered my 3rd via Beautylish, and tried my 4th on amazon via the subscription service. The label was in a different font and there was just a few differences on it. Otherwise looks extremely legit! Please be wary when ordering from Amazon. Apparently the only authorized retailer according to the official Bioderma site is Beautylish.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: It's fine for that initial removal of foundation/eyebrows/lipstick
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take my mascara off at all. It's fine for that initial removal of foundation/eyebrows/lipstick, but the waterproof ones like mascara and eye liner didn't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: ... use it to remove waterproof mascara but it works fine on the face
customer_reviews.text: Stings my eyes when I use it to remove waterproof mascara but it works fine on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: L'oreals works better for me and is less expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few Micellar Facial waters and I was disappointed with this one, it doesn't remove my eye makeup completely and takes lot of solution to get the job done. I prefer L'Oréal's Micellar water in waterproof version. That one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The cap is broken. The water is spilled out all over the place when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Teng W.

customer_reviews.title: Alcohol Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product because of the many reviews that I read and the fact that this product is made in France. However, I got dissapointed with the results. It removes all make up including waterproof mascara as it is gentle enough on the eyes but left my skin feeling dry, and red afterwards. I even had dry patches on my cheek after using this and my moisturizer was not enough to calm my dehydration. So I would not recommend this product to people with sensitive skin especially the ones with roscesia. Maybe it is the alcohol that dries out the skin that much. But this is definitely not for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Antrax

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fungal acne
customer_reviews.text: I recently found out my breakouts were related to fungal acne. For years I’ve been using Clinique take the day off, great for its purpose but horrible for Fungal acne sufferers! You’re essentially feeding the yeast by using the wrong products for your skin if you have this issue. I found this cleansing water is great at taking off make up and my breakouts are clearing up (albeit slowly..). I soak one or two round cotton pads and swipe off my make up. Also FYI vanicream cleansing is great for fungal acne as well as thayers alcohol free rose witch hazel toner!
customer_reviews.author: Mistertones

customer_reviews.title: broken capsule
customer_reviews.text: I like the product itself, but its capsule is broken...
customer_reviews.author: Wang

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction to this product. I have used before without issue so after some investigation I discovered my bottle was fake, not authentic! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: No tamper seal indicator
customer_reviews.text: Item was received with a broken nozzle. And there is no tamper seal indicators on the bottle. The bag it's shipped in is not enough. And tamper seals are also indicative of quality control.
customer_reviews.author: The Troy

customer_reviews.title: the package would be better.
customer_reviews.text: The lid was broken when it's arrived. Hopefully, the package would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't work as well on removing my mascara and eyeliner, I feel like I have to use a lot of it. I do like how gentle it is, it doesn't sting my eyes and leaves my skin really soft. Overall, it has it's perks but I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cowder

customer_reviews.title: Cap broken
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations until it was delivered with a broken cap
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived with a broken lid and a stained ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a broken lid and a stained lable. I thought it was strange and it looked as if the product had been forged.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Matos

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Takes off my waterproof eyeliner and mascara with little fuss. Easy on the eyes, feels light and fresh after using. My skin does not feel stripped or dry. Just clean and supple. I have sensitive skin, and several times a week I wear heavy makeup. This is great whether I wear alot of makeup or none at all. I use it twice a day, at least. I wear contacts and it doesn't ever bother them. Odorless.
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Just water; did not work
customer_reviews.text: As another user pointed out, I think this is a fake product. On my first use I knew something was up. It's literally just water. It did not get rid of any of my eye makeup and I don't even use waterproof. I went through so many soaked cotton balls just to get rid of a light face of makeup. I would NOT recommend this to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A.

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this product but was bummed the cap was broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I enjoy this product but was bummed the cap was broken when it arrived. Not a huge deal but it flies off everytime I open it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good size bottle that you get
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good size bottle that you get. The product itself I really like. I don’t use it by itself normally, I use it after I wash my face so I can take off every last bit of makeup on my face before I move on to the rest of my skincare routine. I haven’t broken out by it and I have sensitive skin. It doesn’t have any sort of fragrance. Will definitely continue to purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea G.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have used various makeup removing wipes and solutions in the past, but this Bioderma Sensibo H20 is simply the best: 1) Less expensive 2) Lasts longer 3) Can use less or more as needed (unlike wipes) 4) Simply works better (especially for eyes) 5) Little to no irritation (don't use too much or it will burn a little if it gets in the eye) 6) No odor 7) Removes shadow, liner, & mascara on both eyes with 1 cotton pad! I am sold...already bought a 2nd bottle. PS...I don't use "waterproof" mascara or liner, so I can't speak to how this product would do with that. But, it removes non-waterproof eye makeup easily and quickly!
customer_reviews.author: 15 Year MemberTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works fine if your skin likes coconut derivatives
customer_reviews.text: This removes makeup great - has no scent - came wrapped in plastic and sealed nicely - but if you are at all sensitive skinned and reactive to anything coconut derivative -- beware. The second ingredient in this - Peg-6 Caprylic/capric Glycerides - is normally a coconut derivative. After just one day of use - the next day I woke with inflammation around my nose and whiteheads - and I knew right away and now can not use it. If you do not have such reactive skin - you will like this. I do love that it had absolutely no scent and does not burn the skin. Bummer that I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Micellar water
customer_reviews.text: This feels very nice to my skin and removes makeup very easily. I know some of the other reviews have mentioned that this isn't authentic. This is my first time trying this and I will say it is better than other micellar waters I have tried (Simple, Garnier, Loreal). I usually follow this up with Cerave PM face moisturizer. I am curious now to purchase another bottle and compare this with the one on Beautylish.
customer_reviews.author: Coco P

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has very little scent and does not create any burning sensation on my skin like regular astringents do. It removes makeup very well and is not overly drying. My only complaint is that the cap looks like it should twist off, but it doesn’t. I wanted to get a bigger bottle and use it to refill this little bottle to leave on my cabinet or use for travel. Since I couldn’t get the cap off, I can’t reuse it. Not a huge deal since the product itself is great, the bottle is just kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie S.

customer_reviews.title: BIODERMA LABORATORIES TEST ON ANIMALS
customer_reviews.text: Hello potential buyers, I WILL NOT BUY BIODERMA PRODUCTS ANYMORE. PLEASE, ENFORCE CRUELTY FREE PRACTICES. There are many different options available on Amazon for micellar water that are animals friendly. Please use your consumer power and consider kindness as a quality "ingredient" in a product when you shop. I have used this one: Micellar Cleansing Water By Source Vitál Apothecary (8.39 Fl. Oz.) and I am very satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Chimelski

customer_reviews.title: ⛑TELL ME WHATS REALLY IN IT!! NOT AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: Update) i stopped using for few months and resumed on the same bottle again and it got me even worse rashes and bumps on picture. My skin was flawless before.. TELL ME WHAT YOU GUYS PUT IT IN!!! Def not authentic. I've been using this for 7 years now and I moved between 4 countries. Never gave me break out or severe dryness or irritation. This one i bought from amazon is only thing that is not authentic. Be aware
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective on red reactive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I used the product to take off makeup and clean my face before bed. It is a great product, does not irritate my sensitive skin and acne prone skin, and doesn’t cause redness or breakouts. I was using thayers witch hazel and although it was good at first, it began to cause severe redness and irritation in my skin. I have noticed that it does seem to be drying to the skin, but that is the only downfall, and realistically it could be weather related. Otherwise works very well and I would highly recommend for sensitive skin, redness, acne. I am either going to re-order the same formula or their moisturizing one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pancake

customer_reviews.title: Best Micellar Water!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first step in my nighttime skincare routine. It is great at removing my makeup and sunscreen before washing my face. I have oily skin so this is better for me than a cleansing balm and I would recommend this to anyone else with oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Paul

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle.
customer_reviews.text: my dermatologist recommended this product and it has transformed my skin! All the bumps on my forehead are gone and I feel so moisturized. Before when I washed my face with typical brands and my face always felt tight afterwards.. I also get acne from underchest sweat and I used this there and it cleared everything up! I am about to finish my first bottle but I noticed a difference after a few days. Halfway through the bottle my bumps were all gone. Just buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: OhWow

customer_reviews.title: Caps Broken but Product is actually OK
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product was fake. The caps were broken and didn't seem have the integrity I thought it should. With that said, I checked Bioderma's website and Amazon is a verified official carrier of their products. Wondering if they send damaged products to them for resale since most stores won't take them. Anyhow - I used the product and its worked perfectly. Calming for the skin in taking off makeup and I have rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: leigh lowery

customer_reviews.title: Beyond My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’m a RN. Sometimes I’m just too tired to remove the accumulated grime until the next morning shower. I always felt very guilty until I found this product. It is everything the product description says it is. It leaves your skin clean and soft and ready for moisturizer. If you purchase anything buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Granger

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find a good eye makeup remover and thought the reviews in this made it an obvious choice. I was wrong. After soaking eye pads and placing them on my eyes for a few seconds and the rubbing all over, I end up looking the a gothic raccoon. So then I wash my face and a get even more raccoon-ed and use this again on two clean pads; which then make me look live I’ve been sobbing all night. Needless to say, I won’t be ordering it again and am off to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Harrin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have heard raves for this product for a long time and decided to try it because my favorite Micellar Water is extremely expensive and this was more wallet friendly. It works but... I have sensitive skin and even though this did not sting it left my face read and inflamed looking. (I have this same issue with every other Micellar Water I have tried except for the expensive one mentioned above). I wish I had bought the travel size and I should have known better but I really thought this would work for me. I'm going to give it to a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou C

customer_reviews.title: I've been buying this stuff for years
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty frugal--I'm not going to spend more than I have to...ever. I hesitated to buy this product because it cost quite a bit more than drug store options, but bought it on impulse once. The difference is amazing--it does what it says it does and is really great for sensitive skin. I've never had a problem with it and my face always feels very clean after using it. Don't buy the knock-off brands, this stuff is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: BoScha

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bottle a few months ago and loved it. Thinking all Micellar waters would be the same , I bought a cheaper brand. Used half of it and threw the rest away. I tried another leading brand. Used half of it and threw it away. Nothing compares to Bioderma. It leaves your face feeling clean and so very soft. I purchased some for my 14 year old granddaughter and now find myself buying for her also. She loves it too!! Don't waste your money on other brands. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Twinsgram

customer_reviews.title: Better than Garnier!
customer_reviews.text: The Bioderma is unlike the Garnier micellar water. I've tried the waterproof and non waterproof Garnier micellar water and they feel oily. The Bioderma Micellar water seems much more like a watery liquid, but still effectively removes waterproof makeup. My skin feels clean after using it! I almost feel like I don't need to cleanse after, but I still do since my skin is incredibly sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicConiferous

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing makeup remover for sensitive acne prone dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is simply amazing. I've struggled most of my life with very acne prone skin. And ever since I got on birth control after my second child I've found, at 23 years old, that my acne became worse all over my body. I have invested in Curology for my skin treatment. They advised this product to me for a cleanser/makeup remover for my sensitive skin. I was extremely impressed by how much it not only removed but didnt strip my skin dry of it's natural oils it needs. Which was very important to me since most cleansers dry me out. This is amazing for makeup removal and doing so in a way that helps your skin stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite thing.
customer_reviews.text: Bioderma Sensibio - I learned about this product way too late in life. I have very sensitive skin and have to use a thick gel or cream cleanser or my skin gets a bit raw and irritated. I’m also on the go a lot, which makes purchasing and packing travel products a pain. I love this product. It’s all you need for lazy/busy/travel days. I still follow a full skin care regimen regularly when I’m at home. But I’ve been using only this (since it covers all of the basics) when I’m away from home and it hasn’t bothered me in the least. It’s the best 3-in-1 ever!
customer_reviews.author: tender_moonie

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I used not put on makeup very often because I felt too lazy to remove makeup. This water make makeup remove so easy that I began to put on makeup all days hat I have to go work and school. Another water I used were not able to remove eyelash mascara, but this one clean it all, you don’t need an extra step for eye makeup remover. (Only if you are use super strong water proof mascara, you may need oil base eye makeup remover for extra help). Overall it’s amazing and make you life easy! Try it!
customer_reviews.author: sese

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for cleansing sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I tried Bioderma Sensibio about a year ago, I've been hooked. It does a wonderful job of cleansing my face of pollution and makeup and does not irritate my sensitive skin or eyes. I recommend ordering some gauze washcloths and apply directly to a folded cloth. Much better for the environment than wasting tons of cotton pads, and helps your product go further!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand because their products are gentle and yet ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand because their products are gentle and yet at the same time effective! What I really liked about this as well was the container itself, because you can just open the bottle, press your cotton pad on the top of it and out comes the cleanser solution without making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxx

customer_reviews.title: Best Micellar water
customer_reviews.text: This brand is gentle and cleans so well I use only this in the morning and after I work out. Unlike some store brands i've used, this micellar water really works well against makeup. I also use the bioderma foam cleanser after my oil cleanser at night and I have had a clear face for more than a month ... which for me felt impossible (I have sensitive, acne prone skin since teens and I'm in my 30s).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: **PSA** I never write amazon reviews but this is for the good of the consumer. I ordered this during prime day sale and just used it. My eyes instantaneously felt like they were on fire. They were blood red and only after flushing them for about 10 minutes has the discomfort and redness gone done slightly. Idk what the hell this is made of but it is not “micelles water for sensitive skin.” I question the authenticity of the product and I’m shocked that this can be sold on a prime day sale. Horrified. I’ve reached out to Amazon already and hope there’s an investigation and that no one else goes through this. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Lin and Tom

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and throughly cleansing makeup even for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Really was nicely surprised by this cleansing water- easy to soak up a reusable cotton pad and wipe clean makeup from my day wear, including mascara and eye shadow. Like that there's not a hard/prevalent smell while using this. I have sensitive skin and this has become a great part of my night time face cleaning routine, will reorder! Usually follow with rose water toner, and face cerum, then top off with night moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Miriana Andreeva

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, will continue buying
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels on my skin, I use it on a cotton round to remove sunscreen and/or makeup every night before cleansing. That being said the Simple Micellar water works a lot better than this at removing mascara and eyeliner, I still prefer this though because I do not wear makeup everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I purchased it based on magazine articles and of course the reviews on here. I was using the Garnier micellar, but it would leave my skin feeling tight and basically was used for taking off excess makeup that my cleanser might have left behind. This is a step up from that since it does take off everything and then some. Plus your skin will feel refreshed and soft afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: michelleh

customer_reviews.title: Great for Super Reactive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have intensely sensitive skin and very mild rosacea and I love this product. When I use it my face doesn’t react at all. That means no burning, no itching, no pain, no breakouts, no redness. I will be using this product for as long as it’s manufactured!
customer_reviews.author: Ickyrode

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I use this to remove makeup after I remove my makeup. You think your face is clean until you use this and it gets it ALL off. I also cleaned my Vera Mona color switch with Makeup Removet until the water ran clear, then, I saturated it in this and more makeup just poured out. This stuff is incredible. Use it before you tone and skincare routine. 12/10 buying again
customer_reviews.author: slypig

customer_reviews.title: This is the only cleansing water I use
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleansing water I use. I used the pink one and the blue one and I love both of them! Both of them erase m makeup very well. I especially love this when I'm on a long flight. I use this water on a cotton pad to erase my makeup so I feel clean and ready to sleep! When I am at home I rinse my face after using this cleansing water though because it does feel a bit sticky and leaves a bit of residue on your face, but on the plane, the bit of residue feels hydrating on my skin so I just leave it .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works for removing a lot of makeup
customer_reviews.text: I won't go back to any other type of cleanser. This stuff is mild and works like a charm. I started using it while working in a theatre gig as an actor. Each night I would need it to remove a fully makeup and it did! I always felt it did the job just great. I would sometimes follow with a clay soap cleanse every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have combination skin and have been trying to learn ways to clense and treat all parts of my face. I recently started to double clense and realized that oil clensers were making the oily parts of my face worse, so I started using this a s a first clense and love it! I have sensitive skin, so I was pleasantly surprised when I did not have a reaction to this. Works well with the oily parts of my face as well as the dry sensitive parts.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product but BEWARE OF FAKES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I have been using it for years (and always get compliments on my skin). I have always bought it in pharmacies during my trips to France. While in the US I run out of product and bought it online. I recognized right away that I got a knock off. Please google "fake bioderma" if you have concern about your product. If you are trying it for the first time and are disapointed, you might have gotten a fake one too.
customer_reviews.author: riri

customer_reviews.title: The only micellar water that really works.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Garnier and l'Oreal brands from the American drugstores, and they just don't take makeup off. This one takes EVERYTHING off including mineral sunscreen, without the ridiculous two-step oil-cleanser/water-based cleanser nonsense. I stick this and a pack of cotton rounds by my bed, and it means I actually bother to take care of my skin on those impossibly exhausted nights. It leasn't leave my skin dehydrated, and there's no film or oil left behind. Just clean skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bellum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It cleans my mascara and other makeup off easily. ( i don't use waterproof) if you get it in your eyes, it doesn't sting badly and rinses off easily for discomfort. I'm on my second bottle! I also love the design of the bottle
customer_reviews.author: suzie q....

customer_reviews.title: Works good but...
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice, it doesn’t have a strong smell. I have been using this for less than a month and it works great. It removes all the makeup fast. Although since I have dry skin, it burns my cheeks and only that part where I have acne scars. However, it worked amazing for my sister with clear skin. It only burns for about 5 seconds and that’s it. It hasn’t broken me out with acne. After you open your face with it it leaves you glowing, like if you just put moisturizer! It is also very refreshing. Very easy to use and pump.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of drugstore products, but for this product the extra cash is worth it. This brand's micellar water feels a lot less oily than the store brands, it doesn't leave behind that weird film that brands like Garnier tend to leave, and it's so much better for sensitive skin because there's no irritating fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL, CHECK THAT IS SEALED I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL, CHECK THAT IS SEALED I bought it and they sent me one open, I used it once and it irritated my eyes and skin too much, I asked for a replacement and I hope the new one is OK, because I have always used this product and I had never had any problems
customer_reviews.author: Tacrow

customer_reviews.title: The most gentle way to remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every method of removing makeup: cleansing balm, cleansing oil, natural coconut oil, makeup wipes, cleanser... Every the most gentle product (no fragrance, no mineral oils...) left me with some redness, and I have oily skin that isn't super sensitive. This is by far the best and most gentle way to remove makeup. Gently pad a cotton pad soaked with micellar water on the skin and it can remove all makeup very efficiently. I noticed a significant improvement in my skin's health since I swapped my Zero Clean It Cleansing Balm with this micellar water.
customer_reviews.author: Khanh Nghiem

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff!!! I was reading about it on a website and the websites wasn't a company that sold this product& told me to get it on amazon. So I hoped that it was an honest reference and not accompany just trying to make money off their product. I'm a genuine skeptical what can I say lol. They use this stuff once A-day or every other day sometimes instead of washing my face and it makes it so soft!
customer_reviews.author: River Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Good for removing eye makeup
customer_reviews.text: Before bioderma, I’ve been using cleansing balms such as banila and Clinique. I didn’t think that micellar water would work as makeup removers until I tried a sample of micellar water from La Mer. I’ve heard good compliments about bioderma and decided to give this a try. It worked just as good as the La Mer micellar water! Now I only use micellar water to remove eye makeup and then the cleansing balm to remove everything else.
customer_reviews.author: DoL

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed
customer_reviews.text: Came to me unsealed and cannot verify the product is authentic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t say it’s for sensitive skin but it works for mine!
customer_reviews.text: OK I’ve tried Mycellar water in several brands. Practically every beauty brand makes one these days...I keep coming back to Bioderma! this one takes off more gunk and make up even after I’ve removed my makeup with other brands .. ya I did my own test. Mycellar waters are not all the same. More expensive ones don’t work better that I have tried. Other ones that might have cucumber or rose water in it, they irritate my skin so it’s back to this I go.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Hope to improve the product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this makeup remover for a while. It can remove all the dirt left on my face after makeup. It doesn’t feel hot even when it touches the eyes, but every time I accidentally get a little bit of it into my mouth, I feel it It's so bitter, and it's useless to rinse your mouth in time. This is very painful. Because I use this product every day, I really hope to improve it. The products I buy again in the future are not so bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Yujuan Sun

customer_reviews.title: Horrible allergic reaction. Not legit Bioderma product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Bioderma in the past and have had no issues. I actually loved it, especially since I have sensitive skin. I just ordered a new bottle from amazon (this distributor) and it’s definitely not legitimate. My eyelids are red, swollen and stinging. Beware this is not an authentic product - it’s definitely fake. I’ve had zero issues with this product until I ordered from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kufel

customer_reviews.title: Favorite makeup remover!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the only products that I have repurchased multiple times and will continue to do so. It's very gentle, never had any burning or itching, and it's super effective and does it's job. There is no smell, or color and takes off any makeup easily. It doesn't need to be washed off, it's non-oily, and it doesn't dry out my already dry skin. On lazy nights, I will just use this to take off my makeup, or just remove the day's dirt and go to bed. On normal nights, however, it's just the first skin care routine step. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Szendre

customer_reviews.title: Not great for eyeliner removal
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because it does not remove my eye makeup (eyeliner) well. I have to use multiple cotton balls to try and and get my eyeliner off. I does remove my other makeup on my face. I will need to compare this product to others to get a general sense of how these types of makeup removers work as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After using, face became itchy and dry
customer_reviews.text: After I read the reviews on Amazon, I ordered and used this product on my face. After a few hours, my face became itchy and dry. My face skin type is combination normal, oily, prone to breakouts. I was planning on this product adding extra cleaning of pores, especially in T-zone areas. The positive product description was encouraging, however, many reviewers were warning of irritating results. Please inform your quality control. Thank you for the credit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as makeup remover for over 10 years. What I love about this is that it is just like water and does not irritate your face or eyes. I cannot use oil base makeup removers as it stains my eyes and it becomes blurry for awhile. I used to order them from overseas because it was much cheaper.. But I recently found out Amazon as it for even cheaper now and comes in twin package so I won't need to constantly reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this water. It’s my 1st step in pre-cleansing. It always off all of my makeup. It doesn’t leave any white residue. I recommend this to all of my facial clients. I doesn’t leave any moisture behind, but technically it’s really not supposed to. You can use this as a quick removal of makeup at say, 3am when you just can’t wash your face, but I never recommend that. I always tell my clients to wash their face afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: miajoycat

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle, Effective Product
customer_reviews.text: My 17 yr old daughter loves this stuff. Hasn’t used anything else to remove her makeup since I bought the first bottle of this and introduced her to the product. My preference, however, lies not with this but with another micellar water product I regularly purchase at Sephora or Ulta. I don’t care to use this product but my daughter definitely loves it......so I keep buying it. It does do a very effective job of removing ALL makeup, including most mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: A Staple in My Sensitive Skincare Routine
customer_reviews.text: I use this every evening on a cotton pad to take off my eye makeup and swipe across my face after cleansing just to get any residue off. I have VERY sensitive skin. Most products on the market bother me in some way, but my skin does ok with this micellar water. I wouldn't say it's moisturizing, but it's not drying either. Doesn't have a scent which is nice. No fake frangrances like another expensive French brand micellar water I've tried and way more affordable. A staple in my routine now.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Bioderma Micellar Water Hype
customer_reviews.text: This product was love at first swipe! I really, really dislike washing my face at night because I am L-A-Z-Y. The micellar water allows me to wipe my face clean of make-up and "life grime" while in bed watching Netflix. And this stuff STELLAR. The amount of face gunk that reveals itself on my cotton pads is...kind of gross really but that is how you know the product is working! The bottle lasts me for quite some time - about six weeks. I hope you fall in love after your first swipe, too!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gannon, Work Play & Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: Not the best ingredients, but I like it enough
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and care a lot about clean skincare. This obvs has some bad stuff like PEGs and all but I like the feeling of it when I wipe my face with a wet cotton pad. Also it does a good job at cleansing makeup. I always wash it off with gentle cleanser afterward. You should ALWAYS wash it off with water, if not other mild cleanser. Otherwise it can sensitize your skin and potentially damage your skin barrier. I only repurchase this because I get to wash it off right after. If this were to stay on my face, I won’t even look at it.
customer_reviews.author: KGKG

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly removes eye makeup and mascara
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this micellar water. I’ve used a few different brands and this is by far the best. I like that it doesn’t leave my skin feeling sticky, it feels refreshing, and most importantly, it melts off any mascara I have on my lashes. I soak two cotton rounds and use this this on my eyes before washing my face. Works perfectly to remove ALL makeup.
customer_reviews.author: A. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: As an European living in US, I miss my well known brands of skincare. Really glad I found this on Amazon, it's something I can't live without. I have combination oily with moderately sensitive skin and I use this everyday without problems. From removing makeup to acting as a toner, I even use it after I use my dermaroller at home. For any type of skin, I would recommend this version of Bioderma micelar water instead of others targeting various problems. It's gentle but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: F A K E !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing and actually using this on my face for a few days.. THIS STUFF IS FAKE. Doesn't remove makeup and I can't believe they are getting away with selling this!!! Wow wow wow please avoid. I really wish I hadn't put this stuff on my face... God knows what it is........ ugh AVOID
customer_reviews.author: SilvS

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bottle, no safety seal, but works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am sick of buying beauty products and having there be no safety seal like in stores! Purchased this product after reading rave reviews and while it's expensive, decided to try it out. It worked as advertised, but the bottle in tiny and there was no safety seal on the product so I have no way of verifying that this is indeed the product that's suppose to be in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessC

customer_reviews.title: Great water!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not always write reviews. But this water really suprised me and I do love it a lot. Both my skin and my eyes are so sensitive that most product on the market irritates me more or less, but this one really does ZERO irritation. It feels just like water but cleans my makeups effectively. Not like other oil-free makeup removers, it’s not oilly at all. I’ll definitely buy again and recommend to every one. The reason for 4 star not 5 is because it promised next day delivery guaranteed, but actually took three businesses days.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Best product to remove makeup and have clean face 👌
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! Great for sensitive skin. I would greatly recommend it to anyone. I have Rosacea and trying to keep your face clean after a long day can be a little stressful and frustrating. This product doesn't dry skin, removes makeup easily and for daily use. My to go product anytime now!! I give it a 10👌 ☺🤪
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Uribe

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: First of all, you need this. This is the BEST makeup remover out there. I have used the original without the pump, the blue one, and this one. This one is by far my favorite! The original is the same product, the only difference is the packaging. This one makes it much easier to get product. There really isn't a HUGE difference, I just find it easier to push down with the cotton round without having to take it out of my cupboard. If you're debating between the blue or the pink bottle, get this one. The blue bottle doesn't work as well in my opinion. It's also not as sensitive to my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Damian

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite micellar water
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this in a French pharmacy years ago and quickly became obsessed. It is legit magic water. I have extremely dry, sensitive skin, and this does not cause me any issues at all. It literally erases makeup. It'll even remove a waterproof thick cat eye liner. You may have to go over it a few times, but it'll all come off. My favorite way to use it is to saturate the end of a Q-tip and run it along my lash line where the eyeliner collects. Takes it all off! Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: I finally found one I like!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Sephora brand non-oil based eye makeup remover, but since they've been out of it for months I went in search of a new brand. After many trials of other products which were often oil-based and didn't work for me, I found Bioderma's Micellar Water. It is very gentle, safe for the eyes and remove my makeup flawlessly. I use it just on removing eye makeup and it works great to remove waterproof and non-waterproof mascaras. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbelt Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best makeup remover I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best makeup remover I have ever purchased! No eye or skin irritation whatsoever. I use this in conjunction with my White Rabbit cotton pads which are the cats meow. Great pair up!
customer_reviews.author: Gilda Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle micellar water cleanser. I bought this because I started using a prescription retinol and I decided to purchase very gentle, skin friendly products. This helps to remove any extra makeup or to gently cleanse without water. Sometimes I’ll cleanse my face in the morning with only this and then I apply my moisturizer right after. This doesn’t irritate my skin at all. It doesn’t strip the skin but still cleanses well. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for face makeup removal but not for mascara
customer_reviews.text: I've heard so many good things about this but unfortunately, i did not have the same experience. This is great at removing face makeup but not so great at removing eye makeup, especially if it's waterproof mascara. It doesn't take off all mascara and it can rip off some lashes too, so I'd recommend using something else for the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how gentle this is on my skin, and how easily it removes makeup. In comparison to my former makeup remover I’m not worried about this burning my eyes; it’s very gentle, can be used multiple times a day, etc. if you need a quick cleanse or bedtime routine this is definetly something to add I have super sensitive and oily skin and this does wonders. No addtl breakouts, oil is under control (BIG TIME).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My holy grail miceller water. I’ve gone through probably 6 of these in the last year. I use them to take off SPF and make up prior to cleansing normally.
customer_reviews.author: APS

customer_reviews.title: Nice but they do animal testing
customer_reviews.text: Im amazed at how awesome this is. I thought it was pricey but i have very sensitive skin and my skin didnt turn red, it cleaned very well, even put it on my eyes and everything came off. I use fake eye lashes and it even took the glue off my eyes. Such an incredible buy.. However!! THEY DO ANIMAL TESTING. Just an fyi for those who it matters to
customer_reviews.author: r w

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this makeup remover. It cleans everything off very easily, doesn't bother me around my eyes and a little goes a long way. Sometimes I use it just as a quick, basic cleanser first thing in the morning. I use it a lot (just about twice a day, daily) yet one bottle seems to last me over 6 months. I bought the two-pack after trying the single one. A great deal for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Halsen

customer_reviews.title: A must try!
customer_reviews.text: As someone with very sensitive skin I’m always very hesitant to try a new skin care product. Luckily I got this in a sample size in a giveaway bag and I was so happy I tried it. I use this as my first cleanse and it removes my makeup easily. It would also be perfect for that late night when you don’t want to do your whole skin care routine but you know you can’t go to sleep with your makeup on. And compared to others I’ve tried that’s meant for sensitive skin this definitely removes the makeup better than the others
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very good micellar water,good for sensitive skin, I use this as the 1st step before washing my face with a cleanser & sometimes just use this in the AM and rinse with just water. the only problem I have is not with the product but is the s&h I wish Amazon would do a better job of packing, add a couple of those plastic "pillows" in the box, most of the time the bottle cap arrives damaged.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great But Not Perfect for Waterproof Liquid Liner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Bioderma for over 2 years because I love how it removes zinc sunscreen and powders without drying my skin. However, now that I have started wearing waterproof liquid liner and glittery eyeshadows I have found that it's not 100% effective for that type of eye makeup. Because of the excessive rubbing I wake up with swollen or irritated eyelids with some residual makeup. For my eyelids, I use the Skinny and CO coconut oil. It's pricey but a little goes a long way. I think any regular, good coconut oil would be just as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Irritating
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it does what it says it does. It removes all makeup with little pressure or effort, and doesn't leave my face greasy. However, a couple months of use my skin became very irritated. I stopped using the water, and my skin was happy again. ☹️ I really like how it removes makeup, and it's a great price for the large bottle. I can't deal with the irritation. It may be an additive that's causing the problem; I don't know. I'm not inclined to drop around to see. Cetaphil it is.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Not as moisturizing as CeraVe
customer_reviews.text: Started using Micellar Water 4 months ago. I bought a bottle the CeraVe at Target. Started seeing the Bioderma all over the internet with people raving about it, so I ordered some. It's nice and cleans my face (after I use a cleansing balm and water rinse), but it is not as moisturizing as the CeraVe. As I age (55 years old), I find I need more moisturizing products. I will use up this bottle, but then back to CeraVe I go. The price between the two was comparable. Each were about a dollar an ounce.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney B.

product_meta.title: Bioderma - Sensibio H2O - Micellar Water - Cleansing and Make-Up Removing - Refreshing feeling - for Sensitive Skin
product_meta.description:
Size:1.2 PoundSensibio H2O is the first and only dermatological micellar water perfectly compatible with the skin. The micelles in Sensibio H2O, very similar to the skin's natural composition, are unique. For maximum tolerance and comfort, these micelles feature a dermatological active ingredient very similar to the skin's composition that immediately capture impurities leaving clean and comfortable skin.

BRAND STORY
BIODERMA has acquired unique expertise by placing biology at the service of dermatology. This original scientific approach relies first and foremost on the skin's knowledge and its biological mechanisms to formulate its products.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
